desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２０％アップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加

dictionary.lore: Once there was a knight who would carry this flag with him to every battle. According to a legend inscribed on a stone fragment, whenever the knight raised his flag beams of light would shine down from the heavens, and those following him into battle would be led to victory by the great power and courage it granted them. The whereabouts of this flag were unknown until a certain piece of information was found claiming that a disciple had taken possession of it. Without any further details, however, that claim remains disputable.

name: 聖光旗シェーステン
